bibl.title: A Hitherto Unpublished Ptolemaic Metrical Inscription.
bibl.note: Drafts of the edition were presented at a CPI conference held in Oxford in April 2016 and at a meeting of the British Epigraphy Society at Durham in May 2016. - Introduction. - The Inscription (Graeco-Roman Museum at Alexandria (?), Inv. 21538, known by a photograph, a squeeze impression and a drawing kept in the E. Bernand archive). Funerary inscription for a woman who died aged forty. Fayum, late 3rd century BC). - Apparatus criticus. - Translation. - Commentary.
bibl.seg: Simon Hornblower & Alan Griffiths, A Hitherto Unpublished Ptolemaic Metrical Inscription.

Drafts of the edition were presented at a CPI conference held in Oxford in April 2016 and at a meeting of the British Epigraphy Society at Durham in May 2016. - Introduction. - The Inscription (Graeco-Roman Museum at Alexandria (?), Inv. 21538, known by a photograph, a squeeze impression and a drawing kept in the E. Bernand archive). Funerary inscription for a woman who died aged forty. Fayum, late 3rd century BC). - Apparatus criticus. - Translation. - Commentary.
